Accept optional cookies Reject optional cookies Cookie settings Dr Emma Wilson Lecturer Research Overview My research interests lie in applying and developing systems and control theory to improve health and well-being, this includes: adaptive treatments; Control theory; Bio-inspired Control; Brain-based robotics; modelling dynamic systems; muscle modelling; developing a computational understanding of biological systems; using insight from biological systems to inspire and improve engineered systems and conversely using engineering techniques to improve biological systems. Show more… PhD Supervision Interests Applying and developing systems and control theory for digital health applications. Including personalised treatment decisions, dynamic modelling of health.
